submissions.name: The Department of Laborâ€™s Internship Investigations
submissions.creator: Propublica
submissions.description: "In 2010, the Labor Department issued a new fact sheet clarifying when an intern needs to be paid under federal labor law. We collected the case files for the internship investigations the Labor Department concluded in the three years after issuing new guidelines."

submissions.name: OECD Regional Well-Being
submissions.creator: Moritz Stefaner, Dominikus Baur
submissions.description: How does your region perform when it comes to education, environment, safety and other topics important to your well-being? This interactive site allows you to measure well-being in your region and compare it with 300 other OECD regions based on eight topics central to the quality of our lives.
